Title: Kurochka Ryaba
Actors: Inna Churikova, Viktor Mikhaylov, Aleksandr Surin, Gennady Yegorychev
Plot: Assia lives in a small Russian village, populated by useless alcoholics. She sells eggs and alcohol to her neighbors, and everybody is happy. But one day, her hen lays a golden egg, and Assia may have a golden opportunity. Now her life becomes miserable, because of her jealous neighbors.
